    #include <iostream>
    #include<cmath>
    #include <vector>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include <string>
    #define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
    #define ll long long
    #define M 1000000007

    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
    ll n,s=1;
    cin>>n;
    ll sum=(n*(n+1))/2;
	for(ll i=1;i<=(n/2);i++)
	{
		sum+=((n/i)-1)*i;
	}
    cout<<sum;
}
